description: Synthetic test cases for edge coverage. Merge these into test-cases.json manually or via script.

cases.message:
Getting a 500 error when trying to save an article. Here's the stack trace:

TypeError: Cannot read property 'id' of undefined
    at ArticleService.save (/app/src/services/article.ts:142:23)
    at async ArticleController.update (/app/src/controllers/article.ts:67:5)

expected.notes: Clear bug with stack trace - should be new_bug

cases.message: It would be really nice if we could export articles to PDF. Our enterprise clients keep asking for this feature.
How do I add a new user to our academy? I can't find the button anywhere.

expected.notes: Support question about how to use the product

cases.message: Something is wrong with the homepage. It looks weird.

expected.notes: Too vague to act on - needs more info

cases.message: Users are seeing a blank screen after login on mobile Safari

mockLinearResults.title: Mobile Safari blank screen after authentication

expected.notes: Clear duplicate of existing in-progress ticket

cases.message: The AI feedback on learning tracks is giving completely irrelevant suggestions. It recommended a climate policy article for someone studying digital transformation.

expected.notes: AI feature bug - should route to AI team

cases.message: ThoughtSpot dashboard is showing yesterday's data even though it's 3pm. The dbt job might have failed.

expected.notes: Data pipeline issue - should route to Data team

cases.message: When I try to add more than 50 users to a cohort, the page crashes and I lose all my work. This is blocking our enterprise onboarding.

expected.notes: Enterprise/academy bug with user impact - high priority

cases.message: Sometimes the search doesn't return any results even though I know the article exists. Refreshing usually fixes it.

expected.notes: Intermittent bug - valid but hard to reproduce

cases.message: I can't log in to my account. It says my password is wrong but I'm sure I'm using the right one.

expected.notes: Likely user error - password reset, not a bug

cases.message: The carousel is showing duplicate articles. Same article appears 3 times.

mockLinearResults.title: Carousel not refreshing with new content

expected.notes: Related but different issue - duplicates vs not refreshing

cases.message: See screenshot - the button is cut off on mobile. Can't click it.

expected.notes: Valid bug report even without seeing the screenshot
